page.title: 15OUTDOOR EDUCATION
page.content:
{A VISIT TO BEWERLY PARK CENTRE FOR {OUTDOOR EDUCATION
THE CENRE IS ITS OWN GROUNDS IN THE VALLEY OF THE RIVER NIDD, CLOSE TO THE TOWN OF PATELEY BRIDGE WHERE THE ROMANS FIRST BUILT A BRIDGE ACROSS THE RIVER NIDD IT IS SURROUNDED BY MOORLANDS AND HILL COUNTRY RISING TO A HEIGHT OF 2000 FEET .THE NEAREST BIG TOWN IS HARROGATE. PEOPLE WHO GO TO THE CENTRE STAY FOR A FEW DAYS. THEY SLEEP IN DORMITORIES AND WORK IN CLASSROOMS.THERE ARE LOTS OF ACTIVITIES TO TRY ORIENTEERING, CANOEING,ROCK CLIMBING,POT _HOLING, SAILING, CAMPING, HILL WALKING LOCAL STUIDIES, SWIMMING, ASSAULT COURSE, AND FIRST AID AND RESCUE WORK.
